resume_markdown:
# Darwhin Gomez

Darwhin88@gmail.com | 347-491-2955 | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  
New York, New York  

## Professional Summary  
Detail-oriented IT Support Intern with hands-on experience in troubleshooting hardware and software issues, adept at managing end-user environments within Active Directory. Proven ability to deliver exceptional customer service while supporting diverse user groups, including VIPs, in fast-paced settings. Strong technical skills in Windows operating systems, Microsoft Office Suite, and endpoint management tools, complemented by a proactive approach to learning new technologies. Eager to contribute to ETech 7's mission of providing top-tier IT support while advancing my career in a dynamic team environment.

## Education  
**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York – NYC College of Technology, Brooklyn, NY  
Expected Graduation: June 2024 | GPA: 3.78 | Dean’s List (5x)  

## Core Skills  
- **Technical Skills:** Windows 10, Active Directory, Microsoft Office 365, Endpoint Management, Helpdesk Support  
- **Programming Languages:** Python, SQL  
- **Tools:** ServiceNow, CrowdStrike, Microsoft Azure  
- **Soft Skills:** Strong Interpersonal Skills, Customer Service, Problem Solving, Team Collaboration  

## Experience  
### IT Support Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**  
New York, NY | Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows via Python scripts, enhancing efficiency in support operations.  
- Provided white glove support to VIP users, ensuring secure access and optimal performance.  
- Managed IT asset inventory and refurbished over 800 devices for redeployment across city agencies.  
- Delivered exceptional service on over 100 helpdesk tickets, achieving high customer satisfaction ratings.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U)**  
Remote, NY | Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons on IT support and technologies to over 200 learners, maintaining a 96% graduation rate.  
- Developed comprehensive testing materials and resources to enhance student learning outcomes.  

## Projects  
### Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant  
- Developed a FastAPI application integrating OpenAI GPT-4 for automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Implemented job sourcing APIs, reducing application time by 60% and increasing weekly applications by 300%.  

## Certifications  
- Google Information Support Certificate  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  

## Interests  
- AI Ethics, Cybersecurity, Science Fiction Literature, Chess, Basketball
